nodes.name: supply

devdoc.details: Automated market maker to deposit ERC20 tokens and withdraw wrapped ERC20 tokens against.

deposit(uint256).details: Wraps a specified amount of tokens into their wrapped counterpart. Caller must have approved _amount allowance of unwrapped tokens for this exchange contract address to wrap.

depositFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Wraps a specified amount of tokens into their wrapped counterpart. Source must have approved _amount allowance of unwrapped tokens for this exchange contract address to wrap.

supply().details: Returns the total amount of deposited (unwrapped) tokens in the exchange contract.

withdraw(uint256).details: Unwraps a specified amount of wrapped tokens into their original collateral. Caller must have approved _amount allowance of wrapped tokens for this exchange contract address to unwrap.

withdrawFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Unwraps a specified amount of wrapped tokens into their original collateral. Source must have approved _amount allowance of wrapped tokens for this exchange contract address to unwrap.
